markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clinch Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6450) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446)

**Trigger**
A creature you had [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) successfully [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296).

</column>

---

Your opponents can’t slip your grasp without punishment. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the triggering creature.
name: Clinch Strike
